scripts.build: tsc && if not exist dist mkdir dist && xcopy /E /I /Y public dist && if not exist dist\viewer mkdir dist\viewer && xcopy /Y src\viewer\*.html dist\viewer\ && xcopy /Y src\viewer\*.css dist\viewer\ && if not exist dist\content\pdfsign mkdir dist\content\pdfsign && copy src\content\pdfsign\sample.pdf dist\content\pdfsign\sample.pdf
